content.p: If you are a current or prospective student and you have a question to ask, we may be able to answer it below. Check out our frequently asked questions for advice and guidance. These questions are updated on a regular basis as we receive queries and as we move through the academic year. If you do not find your question or need further help you can reach out to us on our contact page, or contact us using the live chat button in the lower right corner. Contact Us Where can I find information about my Active Living package? Who should I speak too if I am worried about anything whilst living in Halls? What kind of things would I contact the Residential Experience Team for? We hope this will help answer your query, however if you cannot find the answer to your question, please contact us.
